      • filext

        protected static String filext(String funcUri,
                               String fileId,
                               io.odysz.semantics.IUser usr)
                        throws io.odysz.semantics.x.SemanticException,
                               io.odysz.transact.x.TransException,
                               SQLException
        Map uri to file path, according to db records. Which means a doc record already exists.
        Parameters:
        funcUri - client function uri
        fileId - file record id, of which uri usually handled by semantics file ext
        usr -
        Returns:
        resolved uri of file
        Throws:
        io.odysz.semantics.x.SemanticException - can't find path of fileId
        io.odysz.transact.x.TransException
        SQLException
